content.text: Match ends, Wigan Athletic 1, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Wigan Athletic 1, Manchester City 0.
Attempt saved. Danilo (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Cheyenne Dunkley.
Attempt blocked. Ilkay Gündogan (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Claudio Bravo with a headed pass.

Goal!  Wigan Athletic 1, Manchester City 0. William Grigg (Wigan Athletic) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Callum Elder following a fast break.
